name: Rdiocommander
tagline: A Python and AppleScript tool for controlling the Rdio application.
body:
NOW PLAYING ON RDIO
    --------------------
     Authority Zero
     One More Minute
                                                   
                                              
##Instructions
> python bin/rdio

By default this refreshes every 10 seconds, to customize that try the following


> python bin/rdio -d 5
